items.title: The Healing Rose Co.
items.caption: What makes me proud is making the highest quality products using all certified organic ingredients, to help change the lives of our customers, our employees, and our community. Working with the cannabis plant and sharing her wonders with the world, is what I live and breathe for.  Our products impact our customers' lives in such profound ways and when they reach out with that feedback - those are my proudest moments.

items.title: Blackstone Valley Cannabis
items.caption: Massachusetts small batch vertical licensee operated with social impact at the heart of it all.

items.title: Fernway
items.caption: We're Massachusetts' #1 cannabis vape brand, and we got there by working hard, helping people, and following our vision. I couldn't be prouder of my team and the amazing things we've accomplished in such a short time.

items.title: Trella
items.caption: Due to climate change, outdoor agriculture has been compromised and the risk of food and plant medicine insecurity has increased. We must be able to grow what we want, where we want in order to meet the needs of all communities regardless of geography or economic status.  At Trella, our goal is to disrupt the status quo in traditional indoor farming and bring innovative and environmentally sustainable technologies to industry growers.  To ensure this mission remains at the foundation of the company, we changed our entity to a Benefit Corporation registered in the state of Massachusetts in early 2021

items.title: Ounce
items.caption: Ounce believes the future of flower is female and solely focuses on creating a space within cannabis for women by women.
